welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.description: Choose available courses to learn English vocabulary
basicCard.description1: Evaluate your basic language skills and ability to use everyday expressions
basicCard.description2: Measure your ability to communicate in simple and routine tasks, such as exchanging basic information
basicCard.description3: Take a test to assess your intermediate language skills and proficiency
basicCard.description5: Take a comprehensive test to measure your advanced language proficiency
basicCard.description6: Challenge yourself with a test designed for highly proficient speakers
registerForm.title: Sign Up
registerForm.subtitle: Register and enjoy the service
registerForm.haveAccount: Already have an account? Login here.
authForm.title: Sign In
authForm.subtitle: Sign in and enjoy the service
authForm.noAccount: Don't have an account? Register here.
contact.title: Contact Information
course.buildingBlocks.title: Building Blocks
course.buildingBlocks.description: An intensive course designed for beginners to master the basics of the English language and develop skills
course.communication.title: Effective Communication
course.communication.description: A course designed for professionals to effectively use the English language in a business environment
course.ielts.title: "IELTS" Exam Preparation
course.ielts.description: A preparatory course that helps students acquire the necessary skills for successful IELTS examination
course.travelers.title: English for Travelers
course.travelers.description: A practical course that helps students learn useful phrases, vocabulary, and skills for traveling in English
course.conversation.title: Advanced Conversation
course.conversation.description: An advanced course for students who already have an intermediate level of English and aims to develop their conversational skills
course.writing.title: Academic Writing
course.writing.description: A course that develops academic writing skills required for successful work in an educational environment, including essay writing, papers, and research articles
course.speech.title: Clear Speech
course.speech.description: An intensive course in pronunciation correction that helps students master English sounds, intonation, and rhythm
course.literature.title: Exploring Contemporary
course.literature.description: A course that offers an immersive experience in English literature, including reading and analyzing classic works
